Home/ Services/ Business/ SEEDO Slaughterhouse
SEEDO

Economic Enterprise & Development Office

Slaughterhouse services including hog, cattle, goat, and carabao slaughter with meat inspection

Office

SEEDO - Slaughterhouse

Location

Municipal Slaughterhouse

Hours

24/7 Operations

Services

4 Services

Slaughterhouse Services

Select a service to view the detailed process, requirements, and fees

Slaughter of Hog

Hog slaughter service with ante-mortem and post-mortem inspection

Requirements

  • Shipping permit / Certificate of Ownership / Certificate of Transfer
  • Veterinary Health Certificate
StepActivityFeeDurationPersonnel
1Present shipping permit / Certificate of Ownership / Certificate of Transfer and Veterinary Health Certificate—2 minutesMeat Inspector
2Ante-mortem inspection of hog—5 minutesMeat Inspector
3Pay slaughter fee at the Slaughterhouse OfficeSee fee schedule3 minutesSlaughterhouse Supervisor
4Slaughter of hog—30 minutesButcher
5Post-mortem inspection—5 minutesMeat Inspector
6Issuance of Meat Inspection Certificate—2 minutesMeat Inspector
CategoryWeight RangeSlaughter Fee
SmallBelow 50 kg₱80.00
Medium50 - 80 kg₱100.00
LargeAbove 80 kg₱120.00

Processing Information

  • Total processing time: 47 minutes
  • Please accomplish Client Feedback Form and drop at the designated suggestion box

Slaughter of Cattle

Cattle slaughter service with ante-mortem and post-mortem inspection

Requirements

  • Shipping permit / Certificate of Ownership / Certificate of Transfer
  • Veterinary Health Certificate
  • Large Cattle Registration Certificate
StepActivityFeeDurationPersonnel
1Present shipping permit / Certificate of Ownership / Certificate of Transfer, Veterinary Health Certificate, and Large Cattle Registration Certificate—3 minutesMeat Inspector
2Ante-mortem inspection of cattle—10 minutesMeat Inspector
3Pay slaughter fee at the Slaughterhouse OfficeSee fee schedule3 minutesSlaughterhouse Supervisor
4Slaughter of cattle—45 minutesButcher
5Post-mortem inspection—10 minutesMeat Inspector
6Issuance of Meat Inspection Certificate—2 minutesMeat Inspector
CategoryWeight RangeSlaughter Fee
SmallBelow 200 kg₱200.00
Medium200 - 350 kg₱250.00
LargeAbove 350 kg₱300.00

Processing Information

  • Total processing time: 1 hour 13 minutes
  • Please accomplish Client Feedback Form and drop at the designated suggestion box

Slaughter of Goat

Goat slaughter service with ante-mortem and post-mortem inspection

Requirements

  • Shipping permit / Certificate of Ownership / Certificate of Transfer
  • Veterinary Health Certificate
StepActivityFeeDurationPersonnel
1Present shipping permit / Certificate of Ownership / Certificate of Transfer and Veterinary Health Certificate—2 minutesMeat Inspector
2Ante-mortem inspection of goat—5 minutesMeat Inspector
3Pay slaughter fee at the Slaughterhouse OfficeSee fee schedule3 minutesSlaughterhouse Supervisor
4Slaughter of goat—20 minutesButcher
5Post-mortem inspection—5 minutesMeat Inspector
6Issuance of Meat Inspection Certificate—2 minutesMeat Inspector
CategoryWeight RangeSlaughter Fee
SmallBelow 15 kg₱40.00
Medium15 - 25 kg₱50.00
LargeAbove 25 kg₱60.00

Processing Information

  • Total processing time: 37 minutes
  • Please accomplish Client Feedback Form and drop at the designated suggestion box

Slaughter of Carabao

Carabao slaughter service with ante-mortem and post-mortem inspection

Requirements

  • Shipping permit / Certificate of Ownership / Certificate of Transfer
  • Veterinary Health Certificate
  • Large Cattle Registration Certificate
  • Slaughter permit from the Municipal Agriculturist
StepActivityFeeDurationPersonnel
1Present shipping permit / Certificate of Ownership / Certificate of Transfer, Veterinary Health Certificate, Large Cattle Registration Certificate, and Slaughter permit—5 minutesMeat Inspector
2Ante-mortem inspection of carabao—10 minutesMeat Inspector
3Pay slaughter fee at the Slaughterhouse OfficeSee fee schedule3 minutesSlaughterhouse Supervisor
4Slaughter of carabao—1 hourButcher
5Post-mortem inspection—10 minutesMeat Inspector
6Issuance of Meat Inspection Certificate—2 minutesMeat Inspector
CategoryWeight RangeSlaughter Fee
SmallBelow 250 kg₱250.00
Medium250 - 400 kg₱300.00
LargeAbove 400 kg₱350.00

Processing Information

  • Total processing time: 1 hour 30 minutes
  • Carabao slaughter requires special permit from the Municipal Agriculturist
  • Please accomplish Client Feedback Form and drop at the designated suggestion box

Office Personnel

Key personnel handling slaughterhouse services

SEEDO Head

Office Head

Slaughterhouse Supervisor

Operations Management

Meat Inspector

Ante/Post-mortem Inspection

Butcher

Slaughter Operations

Utility Worker

Facility Maintenance

Office Information

  • SEEDO Slaughterhouse, Solano, Nueva Vizcaya
  • 24/7 Operations
  • (078) 326-5001

Important Notes

  • All animals must pass ante-mortem inspection before slaughter
  • Meat Inspection Certificate is required for meat transport
  • Carabao slaughter requires special permit from Municipal Agriculturist
  • Fees are based on animal weight category
